description.description: A support unit that continuously replenishes Deployment Resources.

introduction.introduction:
Sigma is a supportive guard with the ability to restore Deployment Resources and control and optimize role advantage/disadvantage for her troops' benefits.

　She's known to be the latest product of the Administration's technology, and everything else about her is veiled in secrecy. She uses a nanoparticle hologram body to materialize and interact with things in reality, and is next to none when it comes to detecting and filling in other machines' weaknesses.
　Her personality, however, couldn't be farther from her performance as the essence of super-advanced technology. Her strange obsession with storybooks and obvious need for others' approval are more childlike than machinelike.
　Nevertheless, her innocent and unpretentious personality, combined with her voluntary work around the company repairing old machines, has given a good impression to the employees.
　They have been careful with her, however, since the rumor that she's the daughter of their CEO.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Activates the Terrabrain's self-defense system. Condenses energy from her surroundings and fires it, inflicting AoE damage.
Manipulates her troops' characteristics so as to make up for their weaknesses. Increases Role DISADV DMG RES by 30% for all allies except for herself. Sigma can't be healed.

level5.level5: Role ADV DMG +60% added to buff, Deployment Resources +1 upon death

baseDescription.baseDescription: Using a special algorithm melody, Sigma commands arithmetic cubes and restores Deployment Resources quickly. Restores 1 Deployment Resource. This skill consumes 15% of her HP when used.

level5.level5: Barrier equal to 20% of Max HP for 10 s for up to 3 skill uses

baseDescription.baseDescription: Uses a beeper from her father and summons Machine G.O.D. Daddy, a nanny robot that can't be healed. When deployed, Machine G.O.D. Daddy inflicts AoE damage, forcing the enemies to attack it for 3 seconds, and decreases approaching enemies' ATK by 10%.

level5.level5: Enemy ATK -20% instead, Deployment Resource +1 when used
